text: Kordell Stewart (born October 16, 1972) is a American former professional football quarterback. He played parts of 11 years in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers, Chicago Bears and Baltimore Ravens. Stewart was drafted out of Colorado by the Pittsburgh Steelers with the 60th pick in the second round of the 1995 NFL Draft. Stewart retired in 2012, seven years after he played his last NFL game. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:African-American players of American football Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Sportspeople from New Orleans Category:Living people
title: Kordell Stewart
